If you are new to Keychain, or Hive in general, please check our onboarding tutorial.
You can always access it later on in Settings > Help > Tutorial

The ultimate HIVE wallet.

Manage HIVE assets, and connect to HIVE applications.

Simple. Lightweight. Secure.

popup_html_unlock2.message: Manage HIVE assets, and connect to HIVE applications

popup_html_reset_desc.message: If you forgot your password, you can clear your data but will have to enter all your keys again.

popup_html_estimation_info_text.message:
The estimated account value is a ballpark idea of what your funds are worth.

You can switch between the USD, HIVE or hidden modes by clicking on the displayed amount.
popup_html_estimation_info_text.description: on popup main page, click info near estimated value

popup_html_setup_text.message:
Enter your Hive account name and either the master password or the private posting or active key for that account below. Your master password will NOT be saved and will only be used to generate your private keys.

You may add / remove Hive accounts or keys at any time. If you need to create a new Hive account, you can do so at signup.hive.io.

popup_html_start_date.description: placeholder for entering a starting date

popup_html_end_date.description: placeholder for entering a ending date

popup_html_manage_accounts_authorities_t.message: Accounts with granted authorities can perform operations on your behalf. Most of the time, these authorizations are tied to a dApp or game and only authorize the posting authority. We recommend giving such authorities only when necessary and when the recipient is trusted.

popup_html_confirm_remove_account_author.message: Please confirm that you want to remove @$2's $1 authority on your account.
popup_html_confirm_remove_account_author.description: while confirming remove account authority: $2 is account, $1 is posting or active

popup_html_favorite_accounts_no_favorite.message: No favorites saved for this account

popup_html_al_locked_info.message: Auto-lock Keychain when the device locks.

popup_html_al_idle_info.message: Auto-lock Keychain after the browser window is idle for the specified number of minutes.

popup_html_keychainify_text.message: This feature allows you to trigger a Hive Keychain operation when clicking on a supported link on a web page or accessing the URL directly in a browser tab. Currently supports the following Hivesigner links: transfers, delegation, custom JSON, witness proxy and votes.

popup_html_enable_keychainify_info.message: When enabled, this feature will open a Keychain pop when you click on supported links.

popup_html_about_text.message:
• The Hive Keychain team is led by @stoodkev, a full-stack developer and Hive witness, and completed by two more full-time developers, @cedricguillas and @theghost1980, and @manuphotos, our Community Manager. Our work is funded by the DHF, thanks to the community support.
  • Besides this extension, we provide mobile Hive wallets for Android and iOS, various Hive tools, and Keychain Store, a mobile App for brick-and-mortar businesses wishing to add HIVE and HBD as payment methods.
  • For more information on our products (browser extensions and mobile Apps), visit our landing page.

popup_html_delete_account_confirmation_m.message: You are about to remove @$1 from Keychain. This cannot be undone without reimporting your keys. Please confirm to proceed.

popup_html_disable_witness_account_confi.message: You are about to disable @$1 witness account. Please confirm to proceed.

import_html_text.message:
Import your keys from another Keychain instance using a .kc file.

popup_html_multisig_intro.message: Enable Hive Multisig to listen to multisig requests for this account. Find more information about multisig in this blog. To modify your account into a multisig account, use the Hive Multisig dApp. This is an advanced feature, only use it if you know what you are doing.
